original_text: You may eat any animal with feet that have two separate parts. They must also bring their food back into their mouths and eat it again.
korean_text: 짐승 중에 굽이 갈라져 쪽발도 되고 새김질도 하는 모든 것은 너희가 먹을 것이니라

sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 어떤 동물이든 먹을 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: with feet that have two separate parts
sentences.korean_translation: 두 개의 분리된 부분으로 된 발을 가진

sentences.original_text: They must also bring their food back into their mouths
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 또한 먹이를 입으로 되 가져와야 합니다
